product_name: Lightspeed Outdoors Quick Shelter V - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Using side-pull hub technology, the light and compact Quick Shelter V is perfect for those who want easy-to-set-up wind and UPF 50+ sun protection on camping trips or days at the beach.
short_description: Using side-pull hub technology, the light and compact Quick Shelter V is perfect for those who want easy-to-set-up wind and UPF 50+ sun protection on camping trips or days at the beach.
